description: Leading a team of 5 developers to build scalable SaaS architectures. Optimized page speed by 40% and improved SEO rankings for 20+ clients.
Developed custom e-commerce solutions and integrated complex payment gateways. Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews.
Built responsive user interfaces for high-traffic news portals. Focused on cross-browser compatibility and mobile-first design.
Assisted in the development of internal dashboard tools. Fixed UI bugs and optimized image assets for better performance.
Converted Figma designs into high-quality HTML/CSS templates. Created interactive prototypes for client presentations.
Consulted with local businesses to establish their online presence. Provided full-cycle development and SEO optimization services.
